### Description

### Implementation Plan
<!-- These are implementation hints that should help you complete the task.
     Please check them when you completed them and include the pull request link. -->

- [ ] Find the wall you want to improve. It should be in [tiles/rooms/wall].
- [ ] Copy the wall and edit it using [Inkscape]
- [ ] Edit the [tiles.js] file to include the new wall in some pictures.

### Closing Criteria
<!-- When these criteria are met, we can close the issue. -->

- [ ] The wall is added to the labyrinth and reachable. Please provide the directions.

### Hints

- You might find the [documentation about adding new tiles] useful.
